name: Haim Levkowitz
content: Haim Levkowitz, Ph. D. Schuster, H. Levkowitz, and O.N. Oliveira Jr., eds., 2014 (Paperback: ISBN: 978-8588533974; Kindle: ISBN: 8588533979). Quamobrem: why is it that? Read my blog about things that just don't make sense, and add your own "why" experiences too visit the ColorCenter (The Web-site for "Color Theory and Modeling for Computer Graphics, Visualization, and Multimedia Applications," by Haim Levkowitz, Kluwer Academic Publishers (Now Springer-Verlag), 1997.) Updated September 28, 2022 A note about this page: This page was designed to demonstrate how to create a dynamic-looking page using only CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) tools for the layout and menu actions.
